name: bbmap

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Short read aligner for DNA and RNA-seq data.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependent_to.name: busco
dependent_to.description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
Universal Single-Copy Orthologs
